actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the 25 percent deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals for 1994 and to provide an 80 percent deduction for such costs beginning in 1995.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore the deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals for the taxable year 1994. Makes such deduction permanent law. Increases such deduction from 25 percent to 80 percent after December 31, 1994.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the 25 percent deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals for 1994 and to provide an 80 percent deduction for such costs beginning in 1995.
